title: LowEndInsight Analysis Data Schema
description: A LowEndInsight dataset for an individual git repo.

config.description: Configuration criteria for LowEndInsight to use in defining analysis levels.
config.title: LowEndInsight Configuration Inputs

error.title: Error message
error.description: If LowEndInsight is unable to analyze a repo, it will respond with this error field.
examples: Unable to analyze the repo (https://github.com/kitplummer/blah), is this a valid Git repo URL?
Unable to analyze the repo (https://github.com/kitplummer/blah), LowEndInsight configuration not found.

repo.description: The git repo url being analyzed by LowEndInsight.
repo.title: Source Git Repo

repo_size.description: Space consumed by the source repo.

project_types.description: Enumeration of project types within the repo, based on build tooling configuration found.
project_types.title: Project Types

results.description: The LowEndInsight analysis data for a given repo.
results.title: LowEndInsight Per-Repo Analysis Results

commit_currency_risk.description: Risk associated with the currency of the source repo activity.
commit_currency_risk.title: Commit Currency Risk

commit_currency_weeks.description: How long since the last commit to this repo (in weeks).
commit_currency_weeks.title: Commit Currency Weeks

contributor_count.description: Number of unique contributors to this repo
contributor_count.title: Contributor Count

contributor_risk.description: Risk associated with the number of contributors to this repo.
contributor_risk.title: Contributor Risk

functional_contributor_names.description: Collection of contributors labeled as 'functional' by LowEndInsight.
functional_contributor_names.title: Functional Contributors per Repo

top10_contributors.description: Top 10 contributors by number of contributions
top10_contributors.title: Top 10 Contributors

functional_contributors_risk.description: Risk associated with the number of functional contributors.
functional_contributors_risk.title: Functional Contributors Risk

large_recent_commit_risk.description: Risk associated with the amount of change within recent commits - volatility.
large_recent_commit_risk.title: Large Recent Commit Risk

recent_commit_size_in_percent_of_codebas.description: Percent of codebase changed by recent commits.
recent_commit_size_in_percent_of_codebas.title: Recent Commit Size in Percent of Codebase

risk.description: The risk associated with analysis on a given repository, highest level risk identified.
risk.title: LowEndInsight Rolled-Up Risk for a Repo

duration.description: Time it took to complete the analysis of this repo (in seconds).

end_time.description: ISO8601 Date string for the end of analysis.

start_time.description: ISO8601 Date string for the start of analysis.

uuid.description: Unique identifier for this given analysis.

library_version.description: The version of the LowEndInsight library that analyzed this repo.

source_client.description: Identifier of what instigated this analysis.

risk-level.description: Risk Ratings - Based on NIST CVSS Severity Classifications
risk-level.title: LowEndInsight Risk Classifiers
